content: {"name": "Family Life Restoration Center Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serves Cobb County residents", "email": "", "url": "https://flrconline.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6105 Mableton Parkway Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Mableton", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30126", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8050789, "longitude": -84.5683079}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 944-1066", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social security cards or Birth certificates for every member of the household"}]}
